description: This file defines the AwsResources class, which manages AWS cloud resources, including creation, deletion, updating, and dependency handling. It interacts with various AWS resource classes and utilities for logging and user confirmation.

classes.name: AwsResources
classes.description: A class that manages collections of AWS resources, providing methods to create, delete, update, and manage dependencies among resources, with support for dry runs and user confirmation.

methods.name: get_aws_region
methods.description: Retrieves the AWS region, prioritizing cached value, workspace settings, and environment variable.

methods.name: get_aws_profile
methods.description: Retrieves the AWS profile, prioritizing cached value, workspace settings, and environment variable.

methods.name: aws_client
methods.description: Property that initializes and returns an AWS API client with current region and profile.

methods.name: create_resources
methods.description: Creates AWS resources and applications based on filters, dependencies, and user confirmation, supporting dry run mode.

methods.name: delete_resources
methods.description: Deletes AWS resources and applications based on filters and dependencies, supporting dry run mode.

methods.name: update_resources
methods.description: Updates AWS resources and applications based on filters and dependencies, supporting dry run mode.

methods.name: save_resources
methods.description: Not implemented; placeholder for saving resources.
